name: fneq2d
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0

stmt.origin: syl(w0, wb(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(c0, c2)), wceq(c1, c2))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(c0, c2)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c1, c2))
-| wi(wceq(c1, c2), wb(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(c0, c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(c0, c2)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c1, c2))
-| wi(wceq(c1, c2), wb(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(c0, c2)))

body.origin: |- wi(wceq(c1, c2), wb(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(c0, c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wfn(c0, c1), wfn(c0, c2)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c1, c2))

comment: Equality deduction for function predicate with domain. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 22-Jun-2011.)
